Sql.query: SELECT * FROM CAM_FORMATOD1ADET5 WHERE FORMATOD1ACODI=:FORMATOD1ACODI AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL ORDER BY FORMATOD1ACODI DESC

INSERT INTO CAM_FORMATOD1ADET5 ( FORMATOD1ADET5CODI, FORMATOD1ACODI, DATACATCODI, ENELABORACION, PRESENTADO, ENTRAMITE, APROBADO, FIRMADO, USU_CREACION, FEC_CREACION, IND_DEL ) VALUES ( :FORMATOD1ADET5CODI, :FORMATOD1ACODI, :DATACATCODI, :ENELABORACION, :PRESENTADO, :ENTRAMITE, :APROBADO, :FIRMADO, :USU_CREACION, :FEC_CREACION, :IND_DEL )

UPDATE CAM_FORMATOD1ADET5 SET FORMATOD1ACODI = :FORMATOD1ACODI, DATACATCODI = :DATACATCODI, ENELABORACION = :ENELABORACION, PRESENTADO = :PRESENTADO, ENTRAMITE = :ENTRAMITE, APROBADO = :APROBADO, FIRMADO = :FIRMADO, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION, IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE FORMATOD1ADET5CODI = :FORMATOD1ADET5CODI
SELECT * FROM CAM_FORMATOD1ADET5 ORDER BY FORMATOD1ADET5CODI DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

UPDATE CAM_FORMATOD1ADET5 SET IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE FORMATOD1ACODI IN (SELECT FORMATOD1ACODI FROM CAM_FORMATOD1A WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = '0' ) AND IND_DEL = '0'
SELECT * FROM CAM_FORMATOD1ADET5 WHERE FORMATOD1ADET5CODI = :ID AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL
SELECT * FROM CAM_FORMATOD1ADET5 ORDER BY FORMATOD1ADET5CODI DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
